name: Duel (itch) (Proffasaurus)
description:
Duel

Duel is a local multiplayer twin stick shooter.

Compete in fast paced 1 on 1 showdowns as you fight to control the hill.

Features

Blink to gain an advantage over your opponent.

Contend in 6 unique areas.

Modify options to personalise gameplay.

Tournament mode to compete in an extended game.

Installation

To play the game (Windows)
Extract the Duel 1.2.zip to a folder of you choice and then run Duel 1.2.exe

*2 Xbox controllers required to play, DOES NOT support keyboard controls*

Use x360ce to support other controllers
